remarks: The union of ` B ` is defined on all ordinals.  Lemma for ~ tfrlemi1 .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 18-Mar-2019.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2019.)
statement:
tfrlemisucfn.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrlemisucfn.2 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ( Fun F /\ ( F ` x ) e. _V ) ) $.
tfrlemi1.3 $e |- B = { h | E. z e. x E. g ( g Fn z /\ g e. A /\ h = ( g u. { <. z , ( F ` g ) >. } ) ) } $.
tfrlemi1.4 $e |- ( ph -> x e. On ) $.
tfrlemi1.5 $e |- ( ph -> A. z e. x E. g ( g Fn z /\ A. w e. z ( g ` w ) = ( F ` ( g |` w ) ) ) ) $.
tfrlemibxssdm $p |- ( ph -> x C_ dom U. B ) $.
$d A f g h w x y z $.
$d B f g h w z $.
$d F f g h w x y z $.
$d g h ph w y z $.
